data.title: Eden AI | The Full Stack AI Platform for Developers
data.description: Eden AI provides everything you need to build with AI: a unified AI API, an orchestration layer, and monitoring tools—all on a single, easy-to-use platform.
data.content:
Eden AI | The Full Stack AI Platform for Developers
===============
       

[**⚡Join our next live Q&A session: Product demo, latest updates, and open discussion!⚡**](https://app.getcontrast.io/sessions/eden-ai-monthly-eden-ai-q-a-1?utm_source=website&utm_medium=banner)

[![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/61e7d259b7746e85cff0b6b6_edenaiblanc.png)](https://www.edenai.co/)

Product

![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/6735e65f7d5e26b9359c1bfb_Icon.svg)

READY-TO-USE AI APIs

[Chat](https://www.edenai.co/feature/multimodal-chat)

[Image Generation](https://www.edenai.co/feature/image-generation-apis)

[Speech to Text](https://www.edenai.co/feature/speech-to-text)

[Text to Speech](http://www.edenai.co/feature/text-to-speech)

[OCR](http://www.edenai.co/feature/ocr)

[Object Detection](https://www.edenai.co/feature/object-detection-apis)

[Prompt Optimization](https://www.edenai.co/feature/prompt-optimization)

[Access more](https://www.edenai.co/ai-features-library)

YOUR CUSTOM AI API

[Custom Chabot (RAG)](https://www.edenai.co/custom-chatbot-rag)

[Workflow (Custom API)](https://www.edenai.co/workflows)

[Workflow Templates](https://www.edenai.co/template)

[Workflow SDK](https://github.com/edenai/python_sdk)

ADVANCED FEATURES

[Cost Monitoring](https://www.edenai.co/monitoring)

[API Monitoring](https://www.edenai.co/advanced-features/api-monitoring)

[Batch Processing](https://www.edenai.co/advanced-features/batch-processing-api)

[Caching](https://www.edenai.co/advanced-features/api-caching)

[Multi-API Key Management](https://www.edenai.co/advanced-features/multi-api-key-management)

AI MODELS

[![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/6735f5823f73bc3fd0ca2c4f_image%20644.png) Meta AI](https://www.edenai.co/providers/meta-ai)

[![Image 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/6735f5984415cc01bce2544c_logo%20Mistral%201.png) Mistral AI](https://www.edenai.co/providers/mistral-ai)

[![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/6735f56cda8ec68e777d487a_image%20643.png) Amazon Web Services](https://www.edenai.co/providers/amazon-web-services)

[![Image 6](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/6735f5574dceef72de036450_image%20641.png) Microsoft Azure](https://www.edenai.co/providers/microsoft-azure)

[![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/6735f54728c731ef6a8f1b7e_image%20642.png) Google Cloud](https://www.edenai.co/providers/google-cloud)

[![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/6735f526f26363a48274f570_image%20613.png) OpenAI](https://www.edenai.co/providers/openai)

[Access more](https://www.edenai.co/ai-models)

Use  Cases

![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/6735e65f7d5e26b9359c1bfb_Icon.svg)

SOLUTIONS

[![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/plugins/Basic/assets/placeholder.60f9b1840c.svg) For your Internal Tools & Automations](https://www.edenai.co/team/automate-your-internal-processes-with-ai)

[![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/plugins/Basic/assets/placeholder.60f9b1840c.svg) For your SaaS/Software](https://www.edenai.co/team/integrate-ai-in-your-product)

[![Image 12](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/plugins/Basic/assets/placeholder.60f9b1840c.svg) For your Customers](https://www.edenai.co/team/integrate-ai-in-your-clients-projects)

SUCCESS STORIES

[Spotprent Shop](https://www.edenai.co/customer/spotsprent-shop)

[EVA](https://www.edenai.co/customer/eva)

[Market Master AI](https://www.edenai.co/customer/market-master-ai)

[Central-Q](https://www.edenai.co/customer/central-q)

[Roundstone](https://www.edenai.co/customer/roundstone)

[Kwizmo](https://www.edenai.co/customer/kwizmo)

[Access more](https://www.edenai.co/meet-our-customers)

INTEGRATIONS

[Make](https://www.edenai.co/integrations/make)

[Bubble](https://www.edenai.co/integrations/bubble)

[Zapier](https://www.edenai.co/integrations/zapier)

[LangChain](https://www.edenai.co/integrations/langchain)

[Microsoft](https://www.edenai.co/integrations/microsoft-power-platform)

[Access more](https://www.edenai.co/integrations)

[Pricing](https://www.edenai.co/pricing)

Developers

![Image 13](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/6735e65f7d5e26b9359c1bfb_Icon.svg)

LEARN ABOUT OUR API

[Documentation](https://docs.edenai.co/docs/quickstart-ai-apis)

[Status](https://app-edenai.instatus.com/)

[Changelog](https://intercom.news/eden-ai)

[Help Center](https://help.edenai.co/en/)

[Video Tutorials](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLvoWo6SGiqUfXmTNZVkQo-cFc-JSlmbE_)

LATEST

![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/67cb002e613ae2529716cadd_24.jpg)

Release Note 02/12/2024

[Read more](https://intercom.news/eden-ai)

[Blog](https://www.edenai.co/blog)

[Log In](https://app.edenai.run/user/login?ajs_aid=bffbcf97-a684-4dac-94db-9bf20a8d7595)[Sign up](https://app.edenai.run/user/register?utm_source=website&utm_medium=page&utm_term=header&utm_content=sign-up&ajs_aid=bffbcf97-a684-4dac-94db-9bf20a8d7595)

![Image 15](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/61e7d259b7746ef896f0b6ad_White%20Menu.svg)

Easily integrate  
AI in your  
Internal Too\_
==============================================

The full-stack AI platform for developers to efficiently create, test, and deploy AI: unified access to the best AI models combined with a powerful workflow builder and monitoring tools.

[Get Started Free](https://app.edenai.run/user/register?utm_source=website&utm_medium=page&utm_campaign=homepage&utm_term=main-cta&utm_content=get-started-free&ajs_aid=bffbcf97-a684-4dac-94db-9bf20a8d7595)[Let's Talk!](https://www.edenai.co/#)

We've sent a confirmation link to your email.

Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.

No credit card required.

![Image 16: Eden AI app](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/676d3c0e427c7e2b34494160_Group%2061719%20(3).png)

Trusted by 500+ Companies, from Startups to Industry Leaders
------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 17](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/670e656cb98e8534971eabab_656dd9c447dae519df5688eb_sigfig.svg.png)

![Image 18](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/670e655c66d09b604e5b7aa1_656dd9c44be6e861c56f9572_webstaurant.svg.png)

![Image 19](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/670e654099aff96b3c1b711e_656dd9c448ea64581f279831_synergize.svg.png)

![Image 20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/670e653043d63d270cede3df_656dd9c31bab66563b4b0417_council%2520of%2520e.svg.png)

![Image 21](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/670e652188f22aa996d0ab43_656dd9c3f8f4611b7e351b0b_littlebigcode.svg.png)

![Image 22](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/670e650f72bad0b8b436060e_Vector.png)

![Image 23](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/670e656cb98e8534971eabab_656dd9c447dae519df5688eb_sigfig.svg.png)

![Image 24](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/670e655c66d09b604e5b7aa1_656dd9c44be6e861c56f9572_webstaurant.svg.png)

![Image 25](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/670e654099aff96b3c1b711e_656dd9c448ea64581f279831_synergize.svg.png)

![Image 26](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/670e653043d63d270cede3df_656dd9c31bab66563b4b0417_council%2520of%2520e.svg.png)

![Image 27](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/670e652188f22aa996d0ab43_656dd9c3f8f4611b7e351b0b_littlebigcode.svg.png)

![Image 28](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e3f63f0b6be/670e650f72bad0b8b436060e_Vector.png)

the FULL-STACK AI platform

All you need to build with AI, [fairly priced](https://www.edenai.co/pricing)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 29](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/6765344f006b1fd8f3ecde01_Card%20Layers.png)

### AI Models

Leverage 100+ AI Models through one single API and with a unified billing

![Image 30](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/67653481d19f4f1c786e285f_Colour.png)

### Orchestration

Combine AI models and tools to design your custom AI API effortlessly with an intuitive interface or an SDK.

![Image 31](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/67644e5d2dfe133eee350f30_Design.png)

### Monitoring

Track performance and ensure reliability with advanced monitoring tools.

Tackle easily complex ai integrations

Workflow - Your custom AI API builder
-------------------------------------

[### 1\. Start with a template Use Eden AI's pre-built templates to quickly create sophisticated, automated workflows. ![Image 32](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/6703873711271407919e0ca2_SPEECH%20ANALYTICS%20(1)%201.png)![Image 33](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/67038d095096cd185c2d7f8c_SPEECH%20ANALYTICS%20(1)%202.png)![Image 34](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/67038d1d20abd77e52e58c8f_SPEECH%20ANALYTICS%20(1)%203.png) ### Or start from scratch! You can build a custom workflow from scratch using a mix of AI technologies, including Gen AI, Speech, Text, Image, and Video models. ![Image 35](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/6703c38b90d83547e54532ac_Group%2061511%201.svg)](https://app.edenai.run/v2/workflows?workflow-templates=1&ajs_aid=bffbcf97-a684-4dac-94db-9bf20a8d7595)

![Image 36](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/6704d07d9beb02a189aaf937_Arrow%2041.png)

[### 2\. Orchestrate your workflow Design your workflow by arranging nodes and customizing parameters. ![Image 37](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/6703c67384c0b349747d2f2b_Group%2061524%201.png)](https://www.edenai.co/workflows)

![Image 38](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/6704d07d9beb02a189aaf937_Arrow%2041.png)

[### 5\. Monitor your costs Track AI workflow costs by setting limits, monitoring API calls, and analyzing usage in Eden AI's dashboard. ![Image 39](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/6703c84126a73707313b068d_Group%2061511%201.png)](https://www.edenai.co/monitoring)

![Image 40](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/6704d07d9beb02a189aaf937_Arrow%2041.png)

[### 4\. Integrate in seconds Easily integrate Eden AI Workflows via its API or no-code platforms like Make. ![Image 41](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/670bb7f90018502770c869e7_Frame%201321318705%20(1).svg)](https://www.edenai.co/integrations)

[### 3\. Pick the right AI model Choose the right model by evaluating each provider's capabilities based on your specific task. ![Image 42](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/6703ca0690d83547e54ba08c_Group%2061511%201.png)](https://www.edenai.co/ai-models)

![Image 43](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/6704d07d9beb02a189aaf937_Arrow%2041.png)

![Image 44](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/6703cc48bfa95f2e977a8680_Group%2061479.svg)

Access the best AI models with one API
--------------------------------------

FAQ

Questions we're usually asked
-----------------------------

[#### **Eden AI looks so cool, can I start using it straight away?** ![Image 182](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/61e7d259b7746e252af0b6a6_Dropdown%20Arrow.svg) Yes! All you have to do is create an account. You'll get $1 in free credits to make your first API calls and test the platform. We'll give you an extra $10 free credit if you validate that you're not a bot and fill in a credit card information.](https://www.edenai.co/#)[#### **Do I need to create accounts with AI models providers?** ![Image 183](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/61e7d259b7746e252af0b6a6_Dropdown%20Arrow.svg) No! We take care of everything. You use the models you want, and you get a single bill from Eden AI. No need for multiple accounts and invoices. However, if you prefer to use your own accounts, you can always enter your own credentials and API keys!](https://www.edenai.co/#)[#### **And how does your pricing work?** ![Image 184](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/61e7d259b7746e252af0b6a6_Dropdown%20Arrow.svg) Very simply! You only pay for the calls you make, no need to commit to a monthly subscription. You buy credit and pay only for the AI models you request, at the same prices as if you were requesting them directly from the AI models providers. You'll find more details on our pricing page.](https://www.edenai.co/#)[#### **How is my data stored?** ![Image 185](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/61e7d259b7746e252af0b6a6_Dropdown%20Arrow.svg) We don't train AI models ourselves, so we don't need to save your data. We do, however, offer it for those who want it, simply so that they have access to their query history. We request API calls to the AI model providers chosen by the user. Each provider has its own policy regarding data management, which should be referred to.](https://www.edenai.co/#)[#### **What can I expect in terms of support?** ![Image 186](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/61e7d259b7746e252af0b6a6_Dropdown%20Arrow.svg) We do our best to help you with your projects: you can use our chat directly from the app to get help. We also regularly organize Q&A sessions with members of our team, where you can ask your questions live and find out more about Eden AI. Finally, we regularly publish written or video tutorials to help you get the most out of our platform.](https://www.edenai.co/#)[#### **But ultimately, what's the point of using Eden AI?** ![Image 187](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e7d259b7746e2d1df0b68d/61e7d259b7746e252af0b6a6_Dropdown%20Arrow.svg) One word: simplicity. We do everything possible to make life easier for developers who want to integrate AI without worrying about bundling multiple components (AI models that evolve daily, orchestration tools, monitoring tools, etc.). It's true that you could put these different elements together one by one, but you'd be wasting a lot of time and money.](https://www.edenai.co/#)
